metadata.title: CVE-2022-46768 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Arbitrary file read vulnerability exists in Zabbix Web Service ReportGeneration, which listens on the port 10053. The service does not haveproper validation for URL parameters before reading the files.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
